summary: A test suite that verifies the dynamic conversion of model files to the safetensors format across various scenarios, including standard, gated, private, sharded, specific revision, and access‑control cases.
business_intent: To ensure the model hosting pipeline reliably performs on‑the‑fly safetensors conversion while respecting gating, privacy, sharding, versioning, and user permission constraints, thereby maintaining model integrity and user trust.
